summary: This mod simply adds a small shack outside of the first dark brotherhood sanctuary. I'm gonna warn you, it's nicht so gern.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a small shack outside of the dark brother hood sanctuary, it's made in Skyrim Creation Kit, and requires absolutely no dlc, so you modders who ripped the game don't need to worry about editing it. I am leaving this mod open for remodling and whatnot, as long as you giveatleast some mention to my name in the mod, [u]MadBruh[/u], like I would like someone to add some Mannequins and weapon racks/plaques, and possibly a flat floor, because it is still the natural dirt and grass. 

The shack is open world, so it has no loading screens because I find them so annoying, so be aware that I have not added any chests to it, for they might be looted by random NPC's. AGAIN, any modders, please look into this, because I am only a freshman in highschool and have only made 2 mods. so, help me out by PMing me directions on how to make it to where unfriendly NPC's can't loot your chests and get into the house. It has a fully functioning forge, complete with a workbench and grind wheel thinga majigger. 

Hope you enjoy the shack, it is a work in progress, so please be aware that it is not perfect in any way at all. ENJOY!!
author: MadBruh
